# init(name:visibility:)

**Initializer**

Creates a font collection with the specified name and font visibility.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(name: NSFontCollection.Name, visibility: NSFontCollection.Visibility)
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The name of the collection.
- **visibility**: The visibility of the collection.

## Return Value

The font collection with the specified name and visibility.

## Creating Font Collections

- **init(descriptors:)**: Returns a font collection matching the given descriptors.
- **init(locale:)**: Returns a collection of fonts matching the given locale.
- **init(name:)**: Creates a named font collection object.
- **withAllAvailableDescriptors**: The font collection that matches all registered fonts.
